Format the header of a MIME object.

Source: R/mime.R
format.mime.Rd

The header must conform to the SMTP Protocol (https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc821). Specifically, lines should be terminated by CRLF (not just LF). The “name” and “filename” fields can contain any possible UTF-8 characters as they are parameter value encoded.

# S3 method for mime
format(msg)

Arguments

msg

A message object.

Value

A formatted header string.

Contents

Developed by Andrew B. Collier.
